-- AND @brand_no
${params.queryCondition}
AND (UPPER(style_no) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%',#{params.q},'%')) OR UPPER(style_no) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%',#{params.q},'%')))
AND (UPPER(style_no) IN ${params.multiq} OR UPPER(style_no) IN ${params.multiq} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM item WHERE 1=1

mapper.update:
UPDATE item
item_no = #{itemNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
full_name = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sys_no = #{sysNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
style_no = #{styleNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
brand_no = #{brandNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
shoe_model = #{shoeModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ingredients = #{ingredients,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mainqdb = #{mainqdb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lining = #{lining,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
color_no = #{colorNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
main_color = #{mainColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_no = #{categoryNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
repeatlisting = #{repeatlisting,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
heeltype = #{heeltype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bottomtype = #{bottomtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size_kind = #{sizeKind,jdbcType=CHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
tag_price = #{tagPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
suggest_tag_price = #{suggestTagPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
purchase_tax_price = #{purchaseTaxPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
costtaxrate = #{costtaxrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
saletaxrate = #{saletaxrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
material_price = #{materialPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
supplier_no = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
supplier_item_no = #{supplierItemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_item_name = #{supplierItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orderfrom = #{orderfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
years = #{years,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sell_season = #{sellSeason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purchase_season = #{purchaseSeason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sale_date = #{saleDate,jdbcType=DATE},
search_code = #{searchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
style = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE item SET item_no = #{itemNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, full_name = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_no = #{sysNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, style_no = #{styleNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, brand_no = #{brandNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, shoe_model = #{shoeModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ingredients = #{ingredients,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mainqdb = #{mainqdb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lining = #{lining,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color_no = #{colorNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, main_color = #{mainColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_no = #{categoryNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, repeatlisting = #{repeatlisting,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, heeltype = #{heeltype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bottomtype = #{bottomtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size_kind = #{sizeKind,jdbcType=CHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, tag_price = #{tagPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, suggest_tag_price = #{suggestTagPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, purchase_tax_price = #{purchaseTaxPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, costtaxrate = #{costtaxrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, saletaxrate = #{saletaxrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, material_price = #{materialPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, supplier_no = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, supplier_item_no = #{supplierItemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_item_name = #{supplierItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderfrom = #{orderfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, years = #{years,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sell_season = #{sellSeason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_season = #{purchaseSeason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_date = #{saleDate,jdbcType=DATE}, search_code = #{searchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, style = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT name FROM item WHERE item_no=#{itemNo}

SELECT a.id, a.item_no, a.code, a.name, a.full_name, a.en_name, a.sys_no, a.style_no, a.brand_no, a.shoe_model, a.ingredients, a.mainqdb, a.lining, a.color_no, a.category_no, a.root_category_no, a.repeatlisting, a.gender, a.heeltype, a.bottomtype, a.size_kind, a.status, a.tag_price, a.suggest_tag_price, a.purchase_tax_price, a.costtaxrate, a.saletaxrate, a.material_price, a.supplier_no, a.supplier_item_no, a.supplier_item_name, a.orderfrom, a.sell_season, a.purchase_season, a.sale_date, a.search_code, a.style, a.create_user, a.create_time, a.update_user, a.update_time, a.remark, a.years, a.time_seq, t1.name brand_name, t2.name color_name, (SELECT entry.name FROM lookup_entry entry WHERE entry.code = a.years) years_name
,(SELECT category.name FROM category category WHERE category.category_no = a.category_no) category_name, (SELECT entry.name FROM lookup_entry entry WHERE entry.code = a.sell_season) sell_season_name, (SELECT entry.name FROM lookup_entry entry WHERE entry.code = a.gender) gender_name, (SELECT entry.name FROM lookup_entry entry WHERE entry.code = a.purchase_season) purchase_season_name
FROM ( select i.* from item i
inner join (SELECT distinct obsr.brand_no FROM org_unit_brand_rel obsr WHERE obsr.store_no = #{params.storeNo} AND obsr.order_unit_no = #{params.orderUnitNo} ) b on i.brand_no = b.brand_no
inner join (SELECT distinct obsr.brand_no FROM org_unit_brand_rel obsr WHERE obsr.order_unit_no = #{params.orderUnitNo} ) b on i.brand_no = b.brand_no
inner join (SELECT distinct obsr.brand_no FROM org_unit_brand_rel obsr WHERE obsr.store_no = #{params.shopNo} AND obsr.order_unit_no = #{params.orderUnitNo} ) b on i.brand_no = b.brand_no
where 1=1
LIMIT #{page.startRowNum} ,#{page.pageSize} ) a INNER JOIN brand t1 ON a.brand_no = t1.brand_no INNER JOIN color_info t2 ON a.color_no = t2.color_no WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY ${orderByField}
${orderBy}
ORDER BY a.code ASC
LIMIT 0,#{page.pageSize}

SELECT count(0) FROM ( SELECT style_no FROM item WHERE style_no IS NOT NULL AND trim(style_no) != ''
GROUP BY style_no ) s

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT id,style_no FROM item WHERE 1 = 1 -- AND @brand_no AND style_no IS NOT NULL AND trim(style_no) != ''
${params.queryCondition}
AND (UPPER(style_no) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%',#{params.q},'%')))
GROUP BY style_no ) s
